item.description:
NERAX 2011 will be the15th Festival. Expect to more than 80 firkins of Real Ale. Half U.K. beers from England, Scotland, and Wales; and half American beers from New England. All the beers are cask-conditioned, served by gravity or hand-pump.

Craft Beer Crew Meetup at the Friday Session

6:00pm - 10:30pm - more info to come on where/when we'll meet up, but plan on meeting up about 15 min before doors open.

$15 tickets can be purchased here: http://www.nerax.org/nerax/tickets/nerax-ticket-sales.html

There will be some tickets available at the door, but no guarantees so you might as well buy one in advance.

Admission to NERAX does not include beer or samples. At NERAX you purchase beer at a cash bar.  Beer prices are:

$6 for an Imperial pint
$3 for a half pint
$2 for a quarter pint

There is also a $5 refundable deposit on your festival glass.

Redbones will be offering hot barbeque sandwiches.

fyi - there are also sessions on Wed, and Thurs night as well as 12-7 on Saturday if you can't make the Friday session.

more info can be found at: http://www.nerax.org/nerax/nerax-home.html
item.name: New England Real Ale Exhibition 2011
